name: Spiritus
description:
Assume the role of Albert and Rose, in this bone chilling 2D pixel art survival horror.

Miscreants with broken souls and madness ensues in the 'Sanctuary' a manor devoted to researching and homing the crinimally insane.

Fight your way through, solve puzzles, arm yourself with shotguns, knives and other mysterious items. Team up with Rose and fight hordes of Zombies, savage dogs and slay difficult beasts and bosses.

Level up using Spiritus Points to unleash a whole barrage of tricks, tactics and help you survive the horrors.

The Spiritus Digital Deluxe Edition now also contains the next chapter of the story.

Spiritus will keep you on the edge of your seat!

GAME FEATURES
-Upgrade and get new skills with Spirit Points using the safe room feature
-Fight with blades, knives, shotguns and pistols against foes
-Exploration in a huge game world including a mansion, forest and caves
-Fight evil creatures such as mad wolves, giant spiders and zombies
-Fight epic bosses
-Place traps using good timings
-Use Stealth to hide from foes and creep up on them from behind
-Loads of puzzles to solve and doors to unlock

GAME PRESENTATION
-Wonderful pixel art with awesome shader effects which completely immerses you in the experience
-Bone chilling sound effects, jump scares and a gorgeous soundtrack
